Walter Neff.action: He walks almost backwards, sweeping the ground over which the body was dragged with the rug as they move back towards the car.

Walter Neff.action: He throws the rug into the back of the car after sweeping the ground.

Walter Neff.action: He looks at Phyllis and shares a breathless, tense moment after the car finally starts.
